items.text: Follow these steps to start the Office installation process in your Firefox web browser.

facts.value: To download the Office installer, select this link: {{office.productkey.downloadurl}}
In the **Opening setupproplusretail...** dialog box that appears, select **Save File**.
In the upper-right browser window of Firefox, select the **Download** button (it's an arrow pointing downward), and then select **setupproplusretail** to start the install process.
